label: c_kaf Holonomy Constant
mathematical_goal: Derive the flux constraint constant c_kaf = 27.2 = 136/5 from G2 topology
theoretical_significance: The holonomy constant c_kaf = 27.2 appears in the fine structure constant derivation and flux quantization conditions. Its derivation c_kaf = b3*(b3-7)/(b3-9) = 24*17/15 = 136/5 = 27.2 involves the dimension of the G2 Lie algebra (14 = 21-7) and the number of G2 roots (9). The exact fractional value 136/5 indicates discrete topological origin, not a fitted parameter.

number_theory.9: Number of positive roots in G2
number_theory.5: Prime factor relating to SU(5) GUT
